comments.text: I'd love to help out here if I could get a little more information. Is the plan just to take any any request for things in www.mozilla.org and instead of sending the network request, stubbing it with a stand-in mirrored page?
comments.raw_text: I'd love to help out here if I could get a little more information. Is the plan just to take any any request for things in www.mozilla.org and instead of sending the network request, stubbing it with a stand-in mirrored page?
What does mozilla-central do? Perhaps we need to port something from the Firefox test infrastructure?
